name: Rusty's Rail
storyline:
You play as Rusty, the conductor of this old timey locomotive!
This is your business, shuttling people to and from their destinations across the countryside.
Earn fare money, spend that on upgrading your train to make it faster and larger, and enjoy the ride!
Lots of interesting things may happen along the way, it's all just a day in the life of a conductor for Rusty!
summary: Casual train clicker resource management sim
